virtual SE_DRM_Class getClassType () const
 Gets the DRM class type this object can reference (mostly internal use).

Detailed Description

seDRMPolygon wraps the DRM <Polygon> class.

Author:
Warren Macchi
Version:
Revision: 1.8
See also:
seDRMSurfaceGeometry

Member Function Documentation

virtual SE_DRM_Class sedris::seDRMPolygon::getClassType (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Gets the DRM class type this object can reference (mostly internal use).

Warning:
Don't confuse with getDRMClass(), which is dependent on the actual type held by this DRM class object reference.
Returns:
SE_CLS_DRM_POLYGON

Reimplemented from sedris::seDRMSurfaceGeometry.
